TextEng: "Do you know the Reaper's True Name?"
"Eight Hells? How many are there, anyway?"
Text: "여덟 지옥? 도대체 몇 개나 있는 거죠?"

TextEng: "What's the difference between a devil and a demon?"
"Why are there less and less spirits every day?"
"Is there any way to stop this devouring?"
"But if nobody knows your name, who does the engraving?"
Text: "하지만 아무도 이름을 모른다면, 누가 새기는 거죠?"

TextEng: "Tell me about the spirit who confronted Mephistopheles."
"Is there any way to help her?"
"How do I help her become one of the Lost?"
Text: "그녀가 길잃은 자들 중 하나가 되도록 어떻게 돕죠?"

TextEng: "What does it mean to have one's soul devoured?"
"How did this city get its name?"
"Tell me about the spirit who confronted Mephistopheles."
"Is there any way to help her?"
"How do I help her become one of the Lost?"
Text: "그녀가 길잃은 자들 중 하나가 되도록 어떻게 돕죠?"

TextEng: "I don't understand. What is Mephistopheles devouring?"
Text: "이해가 안 돼요. 메피스토펠레스가 뭘 포식하는 거죠?"

TextEng: "Is there any way to stop this devouring?"
"Tell me about the spirit who confronted Mephistopheles."
"Is there any way to help her?"
"How do I help her become one of the Lost?"
Text: "그녀가 길잃은 자들 중 하나가 되도록 어떻게 돕죠?"

TextEng: "But if nobody knows your name, who does the engraving?"
Text: "하지만 아무도 이름을 모른다면, 누가 새기는 거죠?"

TextEng: "Tell me about the spirit who confronted Mephistopheles."
"Is there any way to help her?"
"How do I help her become one of the Lost?"
Text: "그녀가 길잃은 자들 중 하나가 되도록 어떻게 돕죠?"

TextEng: "What does it mean to have one's soul devoured?"
"Maybe the Reaper's name is among them..."
"You were sent here because you're evil?"
"It's only a matter of time until what?"
"Why haunt a place? That's not living."
Text: "왜 장소에 집착하죠? 그건 사는 게 아니잖아요."

TextEng: "Tell me about the spirit who confronted Mephistopheles."
"Is there any way to help her?"
"How do I help her become one of the Lost?"
Text: "그녀가 길잃은 자들 중 하나가 되도록 어떻게 돕죠?"

TextEng: "Is there any way to stop this devouring?"
"But if nobody knows your name, who does the engraving?"
Text: "하지만 아무도 이름을 모른다면, 누가 새기는 거죠?"

TextEng: "Tell me about the spirit who confronted Mephistopheles."
"Is there any way to help her?"
"How do I help her become one of the Lost?"
Text: "그녀가 길잃은 자들 중 하나가 되도록 어떻게 돕죠?"

TextEng: "What does it mean to have one's soul devoured?"
"I seek the Five-Fold Mysteries of the Sleeping Man."
"I heard one of you scream and saw a flash of light..."
Text: "누군가 비명 지르는 소리를 듣고 빛이 번쩍하는 걸 봤어요..."
